hudson.api
Interface CustomExposureBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
EditType, Result
public interface CustomExposureBean

Interface that an exposed bean can implement, to do the equivalent of writeReplace in Java serialization.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object toExposedObject()
          The returned object will be introspected and written as JSON/XML.
 

Method Detail

The returned object will be introspected and written as JSON/XML.
